message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper proposes a novel approach that combines Deep Dictionary Learning (DDL) and Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) to jointly learn a deep transform and a metric for inference applications. This work falls under the broad category of machine learning and specifically focuses on deep learning and neural networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning) followed by cs.CV (Computer Vision) as the proposed method is evaluated on image denoising tasks. Other possible sub-categories include cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as the paper proposes a new approach that combines DDL and RNN, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as the paper proposes a new method for learning a deep transform and metric, and cs.MM (Multimedia) as the proposed method is evaluated on image denoising tasks.
